SEARCH
Package com.dzieger.services

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
com.dzieger.services.AuthService
@Service public class AuthService extends Object
****************************** Auth Service ******************************* The authService handles all authentication business logic such as: - Login - Refreshing a token - Logging out - Registering a new user The service uses the JwtUtil to generate and validate JWT tokens.
See Also:
  • The service uses the UserRepository to interact with the database.
  • The service uses the RoleRepository to interact with the database.
  • The service uses the UserRoleRepository to interact with the database.
  • The service uses the AllUserDetailsService to load user details.
  • The service uses the PasswordEncoder to encode passwords.
  • **************************************************************************** Methods: - login(LoginDTO loginDTO): TokenDTO - refresh(TokenDTO incomingTokenDTO): TokenDTO - logout(TokenDTO incomingTokenDTO): String - register(UserRegisterDTO userRegisterDTO): String

    • login

      public TokenDTO login(LoginDTO loginDTO)
      Login to the application
      Parameters:
      loginDTO - {String username, String password} - User credentials
      Returns:
      TokenDTO {String token} - Token generated for the user
      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException - - If the username or password is invalid

    • refresh

      public TokenDTO refresh(TokenDTO incomingTokenDTO)
      Refresh a JWT token
      Parameters:
      incomingTokenDTO - {String token} - Token to be refreshed
      Returns:
      TokenDTO {String token} - New token generated for the user
      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException - - If the token is invalid
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - - If the username is not found

      Returns:

      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException - - If the token is invalid
